title: If Every Champion Had Their Own Theme Song
body:
What would it be? 

For example Lissandra's would probably be Cold as Ice by Foreigner, Nami's theme song could be The Tide Is High by Blondie and Amumu can have Lonely Boy by The Black Keys.

I'd love to see what you all come up with :)

replies.body: Mumu's song should be im so lonely from team america.
To The Sky by Owl City for {{champion:133}}
wukongs would be the beyblade opening
Lol, I can see that. At the risk of offending every Wukong main ever, he could have You Spin Me Round by Dead or Alive (don't watch the music video clip, too much 80's, can't handle :p).
